info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 5:10PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of north central Schenectady, southeastern Fulton, southwestern Saratoga and east central Montgomery Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 510 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Galway to near Johnstown. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Amsterdam, Gloversville, Johnstown, Glenville, Broadalbin, Hagaman, Fort Johnson, Galway, Tribes Hill, Charlton, Perth, Berkshire, Meco, West Perth, Church Corners, Hale Mills, West Galway, Whiteside Corners, Lower Corners and South Amsterdam. This includes Interstate 90 near exit 27. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
